name: Heartland (itch)
description:
Heartland Artist Statement

Home meant something different to all of the members of Team Heartland, but one thing was common, a change in home is never easy. Home is something crafted over time, it holds memories and experiences. Heartland explores how both home and our way of life can change unexpectedly through experiencing the last perfect day of a family.

Credits

  • Victor Weidar - Project Manager / Game Designer
  • Paul Frame - Lead Designer
  • Lanz De Jesus - Lead Programmer / Supporting Designer
  • Zoe Stewart - Sound Designer
  • Riley Guerin - Sound Designer
  • Aline Otréus - Graphic Designer
